description: This bid solicitation is being issued to satisfy the requirement of the Department of National Defence for the provision of Task and Solutions Professional Services.
duration_in_months: Allotted 3 years plus 2 irrevocable option years
full_summary:
**Job Posting Title:** Technical Clerk - Intermediate Support Service
**Job Reference Number:** W8485-TSPS2025-03
**Job Category:** 5.15 - Technical Clerk
**Job Type:** Contract
**Duration:** 3 years + 2 irrevocable option years (240 days/year)
**Location:** Remote/Virtual Access
**Security Requirement:** FSC - Secret
**Application Deadline:** November 29, 2024 - 2:00 PM EST
**Job Description:**
The Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking a Technical Clerk to provide coordination and support services to Director General Aerospace Equipment Program Management (DGAEPM)/Director Aerospace Equipment Program Management (Fighters and Trainers) 6-3 (DAEPM(FT) 6-3). The successful candidate will work closely with DND teams to deliver key tasks and projects.
**Responsibilities:**
- Provide technical support and coordination services to DAEPM(FT) 6-3 teams
- Assist with document management, preparation, and submission
- Maintain accurate records and databases
- Perform other related tasks as required
**Eligibility:**
- Pre-qualified suppliers under Task and Solutions Professional Services (TSPS) - Tier 1
- Minimum security clearance: FSC - Secret
- Experience with similar services, expertise in document management, and excellent communication skills
**Application Instructions:**
- Only qualified suppliers will receive RFP documents via email from the DND Point of Contact
- Bidders, submit your proposals directly to the DND Point of Contact/Email: [Bing Han](mailto:DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.ca)
**Contract Value:**
- 3 years + 2 irrevocable option years
- Estimated Level of Effort: 240 days/year
**Compliance and Certifications:**
- Supplier must comply with the Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) terms and conditions
- Certificates and licenses to offer professional services (e.g., Government Services Accredited Supplier (GSAS))
- Award of contract is subject to review and approval by PSPC
**Additional Information:**
- Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada (English or French)
- The Department of National Defence encourages diversity and inclusion in the workplace and encourages applicants from all qualified candidates to apply.
